SUMMARY.description: Professional summary (280-300 characters max, with 4-5 years experience maximum)

SKILLS_LANGUAGESFRAMEWORK.description: Languages & Frameworks skills (e.g., 'Node.js, TypeScript, NestJS, Express.js, Next.js, React, Python, Git')

SKILLS_CLOUDDEVOPS.description: Cloud & DevOps skills (e.g., 'AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, EKS, VPC), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible')

SKILLS_APISINTEGRATION.description: APIs & Integration skills (e.g., 'RESTful APIs, Swagger/OpenAPI, GraphQL, gRPC, OAuth 2.0, JWT security, SSO, OpenID')

SKILLS_ARCHITECTUREDESIGN.description: Architecture & Design skills (e.g., 'Microservices, Event-Driven Architecture, Serverless, Domain-Driven Design')

SKILLS_DATABASESSTORAGE.description: Databases & Storage skills (e.g., 'MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, AWS RDS, Redshift, Redis (Caching), Kafka')

SKILLS_MONITORINGOBSERVABILITY.description: Monitoring & Observability skills (e.g., 'New Relic, Datadog, CloudWatch, ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kibana), Open Telemetry, Grafana')

SKILLS_TESTINGCICD.description: Testing & CI/CD skills (e.g., 'Jest, Cypress, Postman, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions')
